title: Major Dilemma
itunes:title: Major Dilemma
description:
Good morning Steve Harvey and crew, I am writing because I have I am having a major dilemma, my husband and I have been together for about 11 years and have two children. We are currently separated and have been going through some things for the last few years. We've been on and off again. We can't seem to get along...
